title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc outjar to generate a JAR file, the resulting file does not contain the expected META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file inside.
OB: Currently, when using ajc outjar, the resulting JAR file does not include the necessary META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The expected behavior is for the resulting JAR file to contain the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Use ajc outjar to generate a JAR file.
2. Check the contents of the resulting JAR file for the presence of META-INF/MANIFEST.MF.
